actions.text: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. DeLay to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the DeLay amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 241 (Roll No. 365).

description: Amendment sought to exempt certain communications (legislative alerts) from the express advocacy requirements in the bill.
purpose: An amendment to clarify that certain communications from citizen groups are exempt from express advocacy requirements.
